Title: Central ActiveX control store
Description: An example on how to implement a central ActiveX store, which allows organizations to consolidate all ActiveX controls in a single location for further deployment.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An example on how to implement a central ActiveX store, which allows organizations to consolidate all ActiveX controls in a single location for further deployment.

This implementation allows to fulfill the suggested ActiveX Installer Service best practices available at http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc721964(v=WS.10).aspx
